context: Inside search text input box
On the right side of the search text input box.
Tooltip text for the microphone icon on the right side of the text input box.
Default text when speech recognition is awaiting input.
Example / secondary text for the "Speak now..." text.

In case of a HTTP (not HTTPS) connection or any other cause of the user to requite a reactivation for the voice recognition permission, this message will be displayed instead of the default "Speak now" text.
In case of a speech recognition error, this message will be displayed instead of the default "Speak now" text.
Tooltip text for the + FAB on the right of the text input box / bottom right of the screen.
Tooltip text for close button when right-clicking add button.
Tooltip text for clear all button on the bottom mid when scrolling down and if a given amount of cards is present.
Tooltip text for "move to top" button in the top-right corner of a card.
Tooltip text for "move one down" button in the top-right corner of a card.
Tooltip text for remove button in the top-right corner of a card.
Inside the "chromebar" on the top-right corner in the Google Now theme.
Inside the "chromebar" on the top-right corner in the Google Now theme.
Inside the "chromebar" on the top-right corner in the Google Now theme.
To be used when the Google source fills in the current user location. Such a case would be completing "Weather" to "Weather_Berlin", where the underscore equals " in ".
Title for the battery status card.
Alternative title for the battery status card.
Text for the battery status card.
Text for the battery status card.
Text for the battery status card.
Google Doodle setting for the Google Now theme.
Settings button in the bottom-right corner when scrolling.
Header for the settings menu
Category header for theme settings.
Text for the dropdown option in the theme settings.
Subcategory header for theme-specific settings.
Category header for hotword settings.
Text for button to add hotword in the hotword settings.
Text for button to apply hotwords in the hotword settings.
Toast notification indicating that the hotwords in the settings have been saved. Will pop up upon press on the "Apply" button.
Back text to be used in navigation (f.e. tooltip for the back button in the settings menu)

term: Cards appear as you search for something.
definition: Karten erscheinen sobald du nach etwas suchst.
context: One of the emptystate texts.

term: Stacks responds to "Ok Google" and your own hotwords.
definition: Stacks antwortet auf "Ok Google" und auf eigene Hotwörter.
context: One of the emptystate texts.

term: Ask any questions as if you would do with Google.
definition: Stelle Fragen, als würdest du sie Google stellen.
context: One of the emptystate texts.
